description.@en: Your eyes shine with such brightness that looks could blind and will likely kill.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, they suffer [[/roll 1D10]]+[WB] in physical Peril and cannot Counterspell, Dodge or Parry for one Turn. Your foe can successfully Resist with an Awareness Test.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but the foe is left Defenseless for one Turn.

criticalFailure.@en: Light comes pouring out of your eyes. Filled with intense Ætheric energy, you have no choice but to ‘vent’ this power towards the sky in a ray of searing white light. Unfortunately, one ally – as selected by the GM – suffers the Effects of Blinding Gaze.

system.distance: Any one person you can see
